description: Splits one vcard file (.vcf) to many vcard files        with one vcard per file. Useful for import contacts to phones,         thats do not support multiple vcard in one file.         Supprt unicode cyrillic characters.                    VCARD (.vcf)             .      ,               .       .                google gmail.com.           1 , ,    python setup.py install.           1 python vcard_split.py [-h] [-l LOG_LEVEL] [-d] filename [filename ...]  python vcard_split.py contacts.vcf          2 easy_install -U vcard_split.           2 vcard_split [-h] [-l LOG_LEVEL] [-d] filename [filename ...]  vcard_split contacts.vcf
longdescription: Splits one vcard file (.vcf) to many vcard files        with one vcard per file. Useful for import contacts to phones,         thats do not support multiple vcard in one file.         Supprt unicode cyrillic characters.                    VCARD (.vcf)             .      ,               .       .                google gmail.com.           1 , ,    python setup.py install.           1 python vcard_split.py [-h] [-l LOG_LEVEL] [-d] filename [filename ...]  python vcard_split.py contacts.vcf          2 easy_install -U vcard_split.           2 vcard_split [-h] [-l LOG_LEVEL] [-d] filename [filename ...]  vcard_split contacts.vcf
